\doxysection{Perception\+Module Class Reference}
\hypertarget{class_perception_module}{}\label{class_perception_module}\index{PerceptionModule@{PerceptionModule}}


Represents the perception module that handles the detection of nearby vehicles and obstacles in the traffic simulation.

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Represents the perception module that handles the detection of nearby vehicles and obstacles in the traffic simulation.
